snippet: Playing with a bruised quadriceps, LeBron James lead the host Cleveland Cavaliers to a 101-97 victory over the Indiana Pacers on Sunday.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Cleveland Cavaliers defeat Indiana Pacers, 101-97; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Playing with a bruised quadriceps, LeBron James lead the host Cleveland Cavaliers to a 101-97 victory over the Indiana Pacers on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Cavs Win Sixth in Row With a Lift From James
headline.main: Cavs Win Sixth in Row With Lift From James
